//! 1-> create evaluate____ <- your metric fn

//! 2-> in that function depending on the category return the appropriate evalution()

//! 2.5-> if the category is new and has different evaluation labels create an object for the constants

//! 3-> add below its name and the evaluate_______ fn

//! CFC

//! GM

//! GM we add his outgoing

//! and then the metrics so i dont have errors

//! i have to first add the categories by shortest path

//! needed to get the proper metrics immediately

//!has its biggest value at the worst(false) or best valuation(true)

//!second argument is whether the metric

//!so we subtract his incoming for GM

//!this node is a merge node

//!this node is a split node
